title: Welcome To Wherever You Are
description: An alternative cover edition for this ASIN can be found here.How far would you run to escape your past?  For eight strangers in a Los Angeles backpacking hostel, even the other side of the world isnâ€™t far enough.  The craving for a new identity and the chance to start again is something they have in common. But the search for a fresh start isn't as easy as they'd imagined.  And they soon discover that it doesn't matter where you are or who you are - if you can't lay the past to rest, coincidence, fate and deception have a way of catching up with you when you least expect it.
author: John Marrs
